location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to an undisclosed recipient

mods.abstract: Letter suggesting that the recipient of the letter be given a copy of the correspondence relating to Dr William Henry Colvill in order that he can form his own opinion of the matter.The letter also reports that Dr Colvill has since received a new appointment and Pelly's intention to allude to him only in respect of his work for Pelly in the Persian Gulf.
